content: We were like children lost in our own dream; we never knew love's a garden and hard to grow. We thought the magic would lead us upstream, but we fell. It's not our fault - it's how currents flow. Even though it's hard to know you are leaving this picture, you remain another memory of summer when we loved. Even the winter cold feels warm, shining with light from all I kept inside from you. That is how the heart can live on and on.
author: dj TAKA feat. AiMEE
